immediate_attention_side_effects: Severe life-threatening liver injury, kidney injury, decreased platelet count, coma
how_to_use: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Calpol 650mg Tablet is to be taken with food.
mechanism_of_action: Calpol 650mg Tablet is an analgesic (pain reliever) and anti-pyretic (fever reducer). It works by blocking the release of certain chemical messengers that cause pain and fever.
warnings_precautions: Unsafe to consume alcohol with Calpol 650mg Tablet
Consult your doctor when using during pregnancy
Caution in patients with kidney disease
Caution in patients with liver disease
drug_interactions: Taking Calpol with any of the following medicines can modify the effect of either of them and cause some undesirable side effects
pregnancy_lactation: May be unsafe during pregnancy; consult your doctor. Safe if prescribed during breastfeeding.
special_populations_children: Considered safe for children when used as directed by the doctor.
special_populations_renal_impairment: Must be used with caution in patients with kidney disease; dose adjustment may be needed.
special_populations_hepatic_impairment: Must be used with caution in patients with liver disease; not recommended in severe liver disease.
overdose_information: Overdose may cause severe life-threatening liver injury; early symptoms include nausea, vomiting, and general tiredness. Immediately consult a doctor in case of suspected overdose.
